title: Paradox Mobile Game
description: A temporal 2D mobile puzzle game developed in unity.

title: Tor Messenger
description: A high-security, self-hosted chat app that routes all communication over the Tor network.

title: A-Level NEA project - Surviving Earth
description: A-Level Computer Science project (NEA), which scored 71/75.

title: Clash of Clans Clan Tracker
description: A Flask app optimizing Clash of Clans war strategy through algorithmic player ranking and live API target assignment; live at wizardlywinds.cc.

title: High Efficiency A* Pathfinding
description: A multithreaded A* pathfinding algorithm in C#, optimized to handle thousands of paths per second.

title: Random Room Creation
description: A tool that builds a map by randomly connecting pre-made rooms at their doors, using collision detection to prevent overlaps.

title: Wordle Solver with a Pre-computed Positional Index
description: A python script that solves Wordle by pre-processing the entire word list into a fast lookup structure to efficiently filter candidates after each guess.
